sentences.en: Allen Upward wrote a sort of copycat book or parody of the Sherlock Holmes stories called Wonderful Career of Ebenezer Lobb in which he describe one of the characters as wraith-like.
sentences.cn: 他在模仿《福尔摩斯》的山寨小说《埃比尼泽·洛布的灿烂生涯》里使用了这个词，描述一个角色“像鬼魂一般”（wraith-like）。

sentences.en: And you think you can remain undetected by the Wraith as they go by your position?
sentences.cn: 你确信在幽灵经过你们的时候不会被发现?

sentences.en: Do you mean to tell us that there are live Wraith here in this cave?
sentences.cn: 你是说在这个山洞里有活着的幽灵?

sentences.en: I suppose the first time I encountered the word “wraith” was in the 70’s when I read JRR Tolkien’s Lord of the Rings.
sentences.cn: 我第一次读到wraith(鬼魂)这个词应该是在70年代，它当时出现在JRR·托尔金的《指环王》中。

sentences.en: Is it because only a Wraith can enter a secret Wraith facility?
sentences.cn: 是不是因为只有幽灵才可以进入那个秘密的研究室?

sentences.en: My only question right now involves the wraith.
sentences.cn: 我唯一的问题是关于幽灵的.

sentences.en: Of, relating to, or resembling a ghost, a wraith, or an apparition; spectral.
sentences.cn: 幽灵的幽灵的, 有关鬼或幽灵的; 鬼的.

sentences.en: So , what you're saying is the Ancients actually created the Wraith?
sentences.cn: 照你这么说,实际上是古人创造了幽灵?

sentences.en: That child flits about like a wraith.
sentences.cn: 那个孩子像幽灵一样飞快地跑来跑去。

sentences.en: The Wraith cannot be harmed while phased, but also cannot attack or use special abilities.
sentences.cn: 不在物质世界内时不受伤害, 但是也不能攻击或使用技能.

sentences.en: Unfortunately, it also rough enough, we may be a preliminary analysis SILVER WRAITH or clouded leopard.
sentences.cn: 只可惜它还不够粗, 我们初步分析可能是一只金钱豹或者云豹.

sentences.en: Week of Wight: Double growth for Wight and Wraith.
sentences.cn: 死神周: 死神产量加倍.

sentences.en: What could the Wraith possibly want with an Ancient drilling platform?
sentences.cn: 幽灵到古人的钻探平台上来想干 什么 ?

sentences.en: When twilight and Prissy, scurrying like a black wraith, lit a lamp, Melanie became weaker.
sentences.cn: 在暮色降临时,百里茜像具黑幽灵似的急急忙忙点起灯, 媚兰显得更虚弱了.

sentences.en: Why didn't the wraith blow them to pieces in the 38 mins they were sitting in orbit?
sentences.cn: 为什么当他们(险队)在轨道上的星门里时,幻影族不(战机)他们轰成碎片 呢 ?

sentences.en: You're still not certain if any of the wraith on the planet survived?
sentences.cn: 你仍然不能肯定那个行星上是否还有幽灵幸存?

trans.tran_cn: 幽灵，（传说中人在将死或死后不久的）显形阴魂
